程序包 com.didichuxing.datachannel.kafka.cache

类 ZkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.didichuxing.datachannel.kafka.cache.ZkUtil
  • public class ZkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class use to and manager DataCache metadata in zookeeper. it contains uncommit timestamp, commit timestamp and reload flag. the zookeeper structure /DataCache/ all cache rootpath /DataCache/{name} cache rootpath by one cache /DataCache/{name}/commit store the commit timestamp /DataCache/{name}/sync store all node which identify a client. /DataCache/{name}/sync/{nodeId} store one node uncommit timestamp /DataCache/{name}/reload store the node id which will be force reloaded. name : cache name , nodeId : client nodeId
